newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Feb 12.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Feb 12.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Saudi Arabia's Defence Minister Prince Sultan says his U.S. visit not meant for clinching aircraft deal.
- British investment in Saudi Arabia under al-Yamamah offset programme reaches 400 million pounds.
- King Fahd orders medical assistance to Azerbaijan.
- Saudi's Nimir Petroleum Company Ltd. to invest $50 million in Oman's oil and gas industry.
